name: Sylvan Canned Fruits
text: You can reveal this card in your hand; excavate the top card of your Deck, and if it is a Plant-Type monster send it to the GY, and if you do, Special Summon this card. If this card is Special Summoned by its own effect, for the rest of the turn you can Normal Summon 1 Plant-Type monster in addition to your Normal Summon/Set (You can only gain this effect once per turn). Otherwise, return that card to the bottom of the Deck. You can only activate this effect of "Sylvan Canned Fruits" once per turn. If this card is excavated from the Deck and sent to the GY by a card effect: Draw 2 cards, then, if you have a "Sylvan" monster in your hand, reveal 1 "Sylvan" monster from your hand and place that card on top of the Deck. Otherwise, reveal your entire hand, then place it on top of the Deck in any order.
